portraitSize.name: Carousel Size
portraitSize.hint: The maximum size of the portraits in the carousel. Note that the size of the portraits will be automatically reduced if there are too many combatants to fit on the screen.

carouselStyle.name: Carousel Style
carouselStyle.hint:
The way portraits are placed and move in the carousel: Carousel - Centered: The Active Combatant is at the Center of the carousel, the other combatants rotate around it.
- Carousel - Left: The Active Combatant is at the Left of the carousel, the other combatants rotate around it.
- No Carousel: Combatants are always displayed in initiative order and the active combatant moves around while combatants remain in the same position.

overflowStyle.name: Overflow Style
overflowStyle.hint: The way the carousel behaves when there are too many combatants to fit on the screen.

portraitAspect.name: Portrait Aspect Ratio
portraitAspect.hint: The aspect ratio of the portrait. The image will be cropped if it doesn't match the aspect ratio of the portrait.

alignment.name: Alignment
alignment.hint: The alignment of the carousel. Note that the Carousel is intended to be centered, you should use this setting only for compatibility with other modules.

roundness.name: Roundness
roundness.hint: The roundness of the portraits and tooltips.

showDispositionColor.name: Show Disposition Color
showDispositionColor.hint: Show the disposition in the bottom border of the portrait.

showInitiativeOnPortrait.name: Show Initiative on Portrait
showInitiativeOnPortrait.hint: Show the initiative value in the top left corner of the portrait. You can always see the initiative in the Tooltip!

portraitImageBorder.name: Player Border
portraitImageBorder.hint: Special border that will be shown for player characters. Leave blank to disable. If you wish to make a custom image, it's suggested you use the default one as reference for correct sizing.

attributeColor.name: Attribute Color
attributeColor.hint: The color of the main tracked attribute text and bar in the combat tracker. You can use any valid CSS color value (eg. #ff0000, red, rgba(255,0,0,0.5), etc). Default #41AA7D.

tooltipColor.name: Tooltip Color
tooltipColor.hint: The color scheme of the tooltip. You can use any valid CSS color value (eg. #ff0000, red, rgba(255,0,0,0.5), etc). Default #888888.

portraitImage.name: Portrait Image
portraitImage.hint: Whether to use the Actor or Token image as the portrait.

attributesMenu.name: Tooltip Attributes
attributesMenu.label: Configure Attributes
attributesMenu.hint: Configure custom attributes to show in the tooltip.

form.notes: Leave the Attribute field blank to remove it.
